refnamediv.refpurpose: Calls runif function defined on R which takes r(number of random deviates needed), min and max limit of function as input parameters and the result is a set of r random values satisfying the given uniform distribution.

listitem.para: r : number of random deviates needed
min : minimum value of the distribution
max : maximum value of the distribution

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function calls the runif() function in R that takes r, min and max limit of the function as the input arguments and returns an array of r random values satisfying the given uniform distribution.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: // runif on r, min and max y = runif(5, 3, 7)

simplelist.member: Mohana N (Assistant Professor, SAS, Division of Mathematics, VIT Chennai)
